remarks: The weak deduction theorem.  For more information, see the Deduction Theorem link on the Metamath Proof Explorer home page.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2002.)
statement:
dedt.1 $e |- ( ( ph <-> ( ( ph /\ ch ) \/ ( ps /\ -. ch ) ) ) -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
dedt.2 $e |- ta $.
dedt $p |- ( ch -> th ) $.
